meta.name: description
meta.content: An archive of clues and players for Jeopardy! show #7694.

td.p: Alex Hotovy, a student from Omaha, Nebraska
Marty Cunningham, an accountant and voice artist from Arvada, Colorado
John Giambrone, an investment banking analyst from New York, New York (whose 1-day cash winnings total $19,601)

tr.td: THE GRAMMY PHONE
WHAT A CROWD!
THE RULES OF THE GAME
BEASTLY STATE FLAGS
ANAGRAMMED WIVES OF HENRY VIII
PRIME "TIME"

div.h3: Scores at the end of the Jeopardy! Round:

tr.td: John
Marty
Alex
(Alex Trebek: It's not the Grammy Phone, it's...)
THE GRAMMA PHONE
LITERARY AWARDS
FIRST NAME VERBS
ERA OR AGE. PERIOD.
MOVIE vs. MOVIE
(Alex: I don't know how to pronounce this. Is it...)
A WIEN-WIEN SITUATION
